Description: Balli Aviation Ltd., a subsidiary of the United Kingdom-based Balli Group PLC, was sentenced to pay a $2 million fine and to serve a five-year corporate period of probation after pleading guilty on Feb. 5, 2010, to a two-count criminal information in connection with its illegal export of commercial Boeing 747 aircraft from the United States to Iran.

Company: Balli Aviation Ltd. and Balli Group PLC
